gen:link.msg:message: `BranchActivity` with `LoanNumberAxis` MUST be reported {$varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_NonWSWSecuredLoans} times, because the reported value of `NonWSWSecuredLoans` is {$varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_NonWSWSecuredLoans}. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_NonWSWSecuredLoans')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_NonWSWSecuredLoans return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''} {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_LoanNumberAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFSTNumericEQExistenceConceptTypedCovU1_LoanNumberAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
